name: UIPageControl.InteractionState
desc: Constants that define the interaction states of the page control.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The default interaction state, where no interaction has occurred.

items.name: case discrete
items.desc: The interaction state for which the page changes through a single, discrete interaction.

items.name: case continuous
items.desc: The interaction state for which the page changes through a continuous interaction.
